name: CognitiveAssessment
title: Cognitive Assessment
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent assessments performed for the evaluation of cognition.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Intervention.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with general concepts for assessments used to evaluate cognition.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts which explicitly reference specific standardized tools used to evaluate cognition.)

concept.display: Assessment and interpretation of higher cerebral function, cognitive testing (procedure)
